src:
Andi Gilang Gantikan Dimas Ekky di Moto2 2020
06 Nov 2019, 04:27 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Andi "Gilang" Farid Izdihar tampil di Moto2 2020. (Dok. AHRT)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Pebalap Indonesia Andi "Gilang" Farid Izdihar resmi gabung Idemitsu Honda Team Asia untuk menggantikan Dimas Ekky Pratama di Moto2 2020.Pebalap berusia 22 tahun itu merupakan salah satu lulusan pertama dari Astra Honda Racing School (AHRS) bersama Gerry Salim."Andi Faridz Izdihar akan bergabung dengan Idemitsu Honda Team Asia untuk 2020," demikian akun Twitter resmi Honda Team Asia."Pebalap berusia 22 tahun itu akan berpartisipasi di Kejuaraan Dunia Moto2 dan akan melengkapi daftar tim untuk musim depan bersama Somkiat Chantra." Andi yang akrab disapa Gilang itu sempat turun di balapan Moto2 di GP San Marino beberapa waktu lalu. Sementara Gerry tampil di seri selanjutnya, GP Aragon, Spanyol.Andi dan Gerry tampil di beberapa seri Moto2 menggantikan Dimas Ekky yang cedera sejak di GP Belanda pada akhir Juni. Cedera tersebut memaksa Dimas absen hingga tampil kembali di GP Jepang."Bismillah. Alhamdulillah, terima kasih kepada Astra Honda, Honda Motor dan Honda Team Asia atas kesempatan dan tantangan yang besar ini. Saya akan melakukan yang terbaik," ujar Andi lewat akun Instagram.Tahun ini, Andi turun sebagai pebalap wildcard di lima seri CEV International Championship. Ia mampu finis di posisi ke-7 pada balapan kedua ajang balap CEV Moto2 di Sirkuit Albacete, Spanyol (13/10).Andi juga bakal tampil di putaran akhir CEV International Championship yang akan digelar di Sirkuit Ricardo Tormo, Valencia, Spanyol pada 10 November mendatang. (jun)
text:
Andi Gilang Replaces Dimas Ekky in Moto2 2020
Nov 6 2019, 04:27 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Andi "Gilang" Farid Izdihar appeared on Moto2 2020. (Doc. AHRT)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Indonesian racer Andi "Gilang" Farid Izdihar officially joins Idemitsu Honda Team Asia to replace Dimas Ekky Pratama in Moto2 2020. The 22-year-old racer was one of the first graduates from Astra Honda Racing School (AHRS) with Gerry Salim "Andi Faridz Izdihar will join Idemitsu Honda Team Asia for 2020," said Honda Team Asia's official Twitter account. "The 22-year-old rider will participate in the Moto2 World Championship and will complete the team list for next season with Somkiat Chantra." Andi, who is familiarly called Gilang, had gotten off at the Moto2 race at the San Marino GP some time ago. While Gerry appeared in the next series, GP Aragon, Spain. Andi and Gerry appeared in several Moto2 series replacing Dimas Ekky who was injured since at the Dutch Grand Prix at the end of June. The injury forced Dimas absent until he appeared again at the Japanese GP. "Bismillah. Thank God, thank you to Astra Honda, Honda Motor and Honda Team Asia for this great opportunity and challenge. I will do my best," Andi said through his Instagram account. This year, Andi is down as a wildcard rider in five CEV International Championship series. He was able to finish in 7th position in the second race of the CEV Moto2 race at the Albacete Circuit, Spain (13/10). Andndi will also appear at the final round of the CEV International Championship which will be held at the Ricardo Tormo Circuit, Valencia, Spain on November 10 future. (jun)
